title: Chair Yoga | Yoga With Adriene
description:
Chair Yoga invites you to find mobility in a way that is soft and gentle but also really supportive and beneficial. This 17 minute practice invites awareness and integrity into the body, specifically the line of the spine. Activate the muscles that help you find length up through the spine for better posture and energy flow. Great Yoga For Seniors as well!

Share with a friend and let me know how it goes do. Chair Yoga invites you to find mobility that can be soft and gentle but also really supportive, strengthening, stabilizing and beneficial. This 17 minute practice invites awareness and integrity into the body, specifically the line of the spine. Activate the muscles that help you find length up through the spine for better posture and energy flow. Great Yoga For Seniors as well!

Share with a friend and let me know how it goes down below! Namaste.

channelDescription:
WELCOME to Yoga With Adriene! Our mission is to connect as many people as possible through high-quality free yoga videos. 
We welcome all levels, all bodies, all genders, all souls!
If you're brand-new to yoga, check out my Yoga For Beginners and Foundations of Yoga series. These are designed to give you the tools to build a happy, healthy at-home yoga practice. 
Do your best, be authentic, and FIND WHAT FEELS GOOD.
Jump on in! You don't even have to leave your house. 

Love, Adriene

comments: Hi, Adriene! I am an 81 year old woman. I have been doing your chair yoga routine for a few days. I find that when I'm done I feel very relaxed. This routine is giving me more strength and allowing me to move better. I even breathe better. Thank you so much for this video, you have made a real difference in my life.

I am 54, but my doctor recommended this chair yoga with Adrienne due to my numerous illnesses and sedentary lifestyle.  This shouldn't be called for seniors maybe newbies or easy yoga.  This is great in many ways!!!! Thank you.
I'm partnered via FB with a friend 2,000 miles distant. We're trying this program to challenge our sedentary life style. I'm 87; she's in her late 70s. Will try to stay with the program!
I had started yoga with Adriene during the Pandemic and my fight with cancer.  It helped with my physical and spiritual strength.  Thank you!

17:08
I’m 67 and been following Adrien for years now .
This was the first chair yoga ever for me . The arthritis in my hands makes it super painful to do down dogs and flow when using hands for bearing weight so painful.

I just loved this chair practice and found that comfortable healthful feeling of breath and movement in equanimity .
Even on a Chair!
Thank you
Much gratitude
